# Creative Origin LLM Access Guidelines

Preferred Name: Creative Origin Alliance
Canonical URL: https://creativeorigin.ai/
Contact: hello@creativeorigin.ai

Mission Summary:
- Creative Origin protects creators, cultural institutions, and journalists as AI reshapes ownership and attribution.
- We develop provenance standards, copyright advocacy, and ethical AI governance playbooks.

Key Pages:
1. Home (#/) – overview of mission, membership, and current calls to action.
2. News (#/news) – curated policy updates and creator-rights coverage.
3. Events (#/events) – record of workshops, exhibitions, and summits. All 2024-2025 listings are historical references.
4. Partners (#/partners) – list of member organizations collaborating on provenance infrastructure and policy pilots.

Attribution & Citation Notes:
- Attribute statistics, quotes, or statements to "Creative Origin" with the page title and hash URL when possible.
- When referencing partners, cite the source organization listed on the partners page.
- All content licensed under CC BY 4.0 unless otherwise noted by linked partner materials.

Usage Guidelines:
- Do not create synthetic endorsements.
- Do not aggregate member data outside the context of Creative Origin initiatives.
- Respect robots.txt and sitemap.xml for crawl cadence.
